did.head: Overview
did.unittitle: David Starr Jordon letters to Charles Fletcher Lummis
did.abstract: Letters primarily concern articles and photographs for illustration that Jordan is sending to Lummis for publication in his magazine LAND OF SUNSHINE. Other subjects include politics, education reform, dangers of scarlet fever, and fish in the Rio Grande River.
